author: Chua Lee Ming J:
casenumber: General Division of the High Court — Suit No 584 of 2019
casename: Tan Yi Lin Cheryl v AIA Singapore Pte Ltd
counsel: Tan Yew Fai (Y F Tan & Co) for the plaintiff; Tan Teck San Kelvin and Chng Teck Kian Desmond (Zhuang Deqiang) (Drew & Napier LLC) for the defendant.

headings.text: Whether the Insured had an obligation of continuing disclosure?
Whether there was fraudulent misrepresentation and/or fraudulent non-disclosure of material information by the insured?
Whether the Insured/plaintiff told Aik about the applications for other policies?
Whether the misrepresentations and non-disclosures were fraudulent?
Whether the defendant was induced by the misrepresentations?
Whether the defendant had waived its rights under the Policy?
